findings: Missing guardrails on 2 floor openings Level B1. Incomplete fire extinguisher tags in trailer area.
corrective_actions: Install guardrails by end of day. Update fire extinguisher inspection tags.

findings: All PPE requirements met. Housekeeping excellent. One ladder without safety feet identified and removed from service.
corrective_actions: Replace ladder safety feet and return to service after inspection.

findings: Excavation shoring needs reinforcement at south wall. Trench box alignment shifted 3 inches. Emergency exit path partially blocked by material storage.
corrective_actions: Realign trench box and add additional shoring. Clear emergency exit path immediately.

findings: Annual crane inspection passed. All safety devices functional. Wire rope within acceptable wear limits. Operator certifications current.
corrective_actions: No corrective actions required. Schedule next annual inspection April 2026.

findings: Heat illness prevention plan not posted at all hydration stations. Two workers observed without high-vis vests. Shade structure inadequate for crew size.
corrective_actions: Post heat prevention plan at all stations. Issue vests to workers. Add additional shade structures by Monday.

findings: Fall protection 100% compliant on steel erection. Silica dust monitoring within limits. First aid kit restocked and complete.
corrective_actions: Continue current safety protocols. Schedule next silica monitoring for November.

findings: Barge safety railings missing in two locations. Life ring stations need additional rope. Pile driving noise exceeds 85dB at adjacent property line.
corrective_actions: Install temporary railings on barge. Replace life ring ropes. Install additional noise barriers.

findings: All marine safety equipment operational. PFDs available for all marine workers. Emergency response boat staged and fueled. Dive team communication system tested.
corrective_actions: No major corrective actions. Replace expired flares by October 15.

findings: Traffic control signs faded and difficult to read at night. Flagging station 2 missing stop/slow paddle. Temporary barrier reflectors need replacement.
corrective_actions: Replace faded signs within 48 hours. Issue new paddle to Station 2. Replace barrier reflectors.

findings: All fall protection in place on bridge deck. Over-water safety nets properly installed. Hard hat compliance 100%. Tool tethering program effective.
corrective_actions: No corrective actions. Continue current safety program.

findings: Housekeeping good on all floors. One fire extinguisher expired in Level 4 mechanical room. Emergency eyewash station needs weekly flush verification.
corrective_actions: Replace expired extinguisher. Implement weekly eyewash flush log.

findings: Confined space program fully implemented for utility chases. Respiratory protection for concrete cutting adequate. All scaffold tags current.
corrective_actions: No major findings. Continue monitoring confined space entries.
